title: Pair Of Custard Cups And Cover, ca. 1725–50
description:
A, B) On plain foot inverted bell-shaped cup; the outside covered with relief-cut artichoke leaves, forming scalloped edge above inner rim.
A, B) Cover, slightly domed, covered with relief-cut artichoke leaves, and a row of standing leaves around edge. Four-leaf knob finial.

type.name: Pair of custard cups and cover

tombstone.epitaph: Pair Of Custard Cups And Cover, ca. 1725–50. Soft-paste porcelain. Gift of Catharine Oglesby. 1958-119-1-a/d.
